Graph Random Model

  • The other implemented pipeline used to generate random graphs with anomalies only requires a number of node and number of egdes as input. The generated weighted graphs are created using Erdos Renyi models, with anomalies generated with Erdos Renyi.

Generation

  • The process is as follows:

    • Read input parameters:

    • Generate independently the normal graph and the anomaly graph with Erdos-Renyi models with the specified parameters, and set all weights to

    • For each node of , uniformly pick in a node that has not already been selected

    • Generate graph as the union of and ; if an edge of is already in , merge them and increase the weight by

    • Randomly pick edges in and increase their weight by until the total sum of the weights specified as input is reached.
